title: ILocalLinearPatternFeatureData.D1Axis
description: Gets or sets Direction 1 for this linear component pattern feature.
returns: Direction 1 entity: linear edge , line , axis , dimension , planar face , planar surface , conical face, conical surface, circular edge, or reference plane
remarks:
Use
ILocalLinearPatternFeatureData::GetD1AxisType
to determine the type of object to pass to this property.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this property.
